nodes.text: Injure/Kill was an Alter-based Force power which allowed a Force-sensitive to harm an individual's body with the intention of injuring or killing them. It was considered to be a dark side power which was used among the Sith.

An individual using Injure/Kill had to be touching their intended target, although according to the Jedi Seer Sabla-Mandibu, the Sith were able to use the power on others without reservation from a distance.
